title: How Primož Roglič took Jumbo-Visma to the Top of the World: ‘He’s Our King’
content:
Roglič and Jumbo-Visma rose hand-in-hand to the top of the grand tour hierarchy. Can Roglič fulfil his Tour de France quest without them?

Read the full article at How Primož Roglič took Jumbo-Visma to the Top of the World: ‘He’s Our King’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
